sentences.en: Although seascape US, but this stage actually frequently is facing the ocean waves impact.
sentences.cn: 海景虽美, 但这个舞台却时刻面临着海浪的冲击.

sentences.en: From 1883 to 1908, the Monet painted many landscapes in the Mediterranean and the seascape.
sentences.cn: 1883年至1908年间, 莫奈在地中海画了许多风景画和海景画.

sentences.en: Here, have pleasant climate, beautiful seascape and rich marine product, hospitable people.
sentences.cn: 这里有着宜人的气候, 美丽的海景,丰富的海产, 好客的人们.

sentences.en: Longtop International ( Xianmen ) provides a modernized working environment with full seascape and advanced equipments.
sentences.cn: 厦门 融通 国际公司具有全海景美丽的现代化工作环境,设备先进,布满活力.

sentences.en: Opponents say a unique landscape or seascape is being overshadowed, to the detriment of tourists and residents alike.
sentences.cn: 反对者认为，风能技术会遮挡独特的风景或海景，对当地居民及游客都不公平。

sentences.en: Overlooking by the window, enjoy 270 O seascape as much as you like.
sentences.cn: 凭窗远眺, 270O无敌海景尽情收纳.

sentences.en: The pale blue walls of this room hangs the black lacquer framed seascape.
sentences.cn: 这个房间淡蓝色的墙壁上挂着黑色漆框的海景图.

sentences.en: The rolling sea is another seascape of surging waves.
sentences.cn: 海上扬波,又是一幅波涛汹涌的海景.

sentences.en: The show also includes an exquisite Seurat seascape, some notable Cezannes and considerable painting by Courbet, Gauguin, Van Gogh and others.
sentences.cn: 这次展出的作品，包括一幅修拉的出色海景画，数幅塞尚名画，及库尔贝、高更、梵高等人的不少画作。

sentences.en: You may enjoy a big meal by seascape in our Hotel.
sentences.cn: 你可以在酒店享用海景大餐.
